attributes.action: Investigate very High fuel costs,Western Isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the government to investigate why Petrol and Diesel are regularly sold at 15 to 20 pence more per litre than the rest of The United Kingdom. And to enforce price controls or introduce a rural fuel subsidy .

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
